import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Meta from '../components/Meta' import { getFeedbackDetails } from '../actions/feedbackActions' const FeedbackDetailScreen = ({ history, match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const feedbackDetails = useSelector((state) => state.feedbackDetails) const { loading, error, feedback } = feedbackDetails const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin useEffect(() => { if (!feedback._id || feedback._id !== match.params.id) dispatch(getFeedbackDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) return ( <> Go Back {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : ( <>

{feedback.bookName}

{feedback.authorName}

 )} ) } export default FeedbackDetailScreen
